Text:
Hej. Om du kan, kan du då lägga upp Mathias Holmgren's nya skiva. Den heter Lejonhjärta.

Alltså
Mathias Holmgren - Lejonhjärta

Vore skitbra om du skulle kunna fixa det :)
this is the most beautiful recording of das lied, ever
Otto Klemperer's in my opinion is the most beautiful recording.
Personally, I much prefer Walter's recording of this work with Mildred Miller and Ernst Haefliger.
